I'm fairly sure I have seen a trick for how to do this posted, but can't find it with a quick look through my archives. It's not supported natively AFAIK, but there is a workaround involving rotating the grid 90 degrees and then rotating each cell -90 degrees. This can be done using layout transforms.

Hopefully this helps at least a little.
